rukus.text: al-hamdu lillahi alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda wajaʿala l-zulumati wal-nura thumma alladhina kafaru birabbihim yaʿdiluna
huwa alladhi khalaqakum min tinin thumma qada ajalan wa-ajalun musamman ʿindahu thumma antum tamtaruna
wahuwa l-lahu fi l-samawati wafi l-ardi yaʿlamu sirrakum wajahrakum wayaʿlamu ma taksibuna
wama tatihim min ayatin min ayati rabbihim illa kanu ʿanha muʿ'ridina
faqad kadhabu bil-haqi lamma jaahum fasawfa yatihim anbau ma kanu bihi yastahziuna

alam yaraw kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarnin makkannahum fi l-ardi ma lam numakkin lakum wa-arsalna l-samaa ʿalayhim mid'raran wajaʿalna l-anhara tajri min tahtihim fa-ahlaknahum bidhunubihim wa-anshana min baʿdihim qarnan akharina
walaw nazzalna ʿalayka kitaban fi qir'tasin falamasuhu bi-aydihim laqala alladhina kafaru in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
waqalu lawla unzila ʿalayhi malakun walaw anzalna malakan laqudiya l-amru thumma la yunzaruna
walaw jaʿalnahu malakan lajaʿalnahu rajulan walalabasna ʿalayhim ma yalbisuna
walaqadi us'tuh'zi-a birusulin min qablika fahaqa bi-alladhina sakhiru min'hum ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
